document_data.name: Manyfins
document_data.mainbody: '''Manyfins''' was a name given to a type of [[fish]] found in [[the Vast]] in [[north Faerûn]].
document_data.Description: It was very small in size, characterized by its number of fins, and had a sharp taste.
document_data.Ecology: They were called "manyfins" by [[Melicent Mellicot|Melicent]], [[Meliors Mellicot|Meliors]], and [[Melusine Mellicot]]. They stocked [[Swords Pool (pool)|Swords Pool]] with manyfins and [[trout]] around [[1370 DR]]. Although they discouraged fishing, some people did it anyway on dark nights.
